comments.raw_text:
STR:
1. Set "layers.acceleration.disabled" to true
2. Open a new window (so that the previous setting takes effect).
3. Visit some page.
4. Visit http://www.smbc-comics.com/comics/20111117after.gif
5. Note the content of the page from 3 is rendered instead of a black gif from 4

Expected:
Render a large, solid black gif image.

Reproduced on OSX Lion, Nvidia and Intel graphics cards.
Reproduced on Firefox 7, 8, 10, 11.
comments.creator: mattm@letsencrypt.org
comments.author: mattm@letsencrypt.org
comments.text:
STR:
1. Set "layers.acceleration.disabled" to true
2. Open a new window (so that the previous setting takes effect).
3. Visit some page.
4. Visit http://www.smbc-comics.com/comics/20111117after.gif
5. Note the content of the page from 3 is rendered instead of a black gif from 4

Reproduced on OSX Lion, Nvidia and Intel graphics cards.
